title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions:
Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles

A simple, comfortable way to wash and care for your skin.

Easy to hold
- Long 17-inch wooden handle helps you reach your back, legs, and feet without bending or stretching.
- Non-slip rubber grip keeps the handle steady, even with soapy hands.
- Hanging rope makes it easy to store and dry after use.

Gentle and deep cleaning in one
- Soft side (nylon bristles): gentle on sensitive skin. Use this side for daily washing.
- Stiff side (natural bristles): helps remove dry, flaky skin. Use this side for a deeper clean. Works for both wet or dry brushing.

Simple to use
- In the shower: wet the brush, add a small amount of soap, and brush toward your heart with light strokes.
- For dry brushing: use the stiff side on dry skin before bathing. Use short, gentle strokes.

Easy care
- Rinse well after each use. Shake off water and hang by the rope to air-dry.
- Wash the brush every few weeks with mild soap and water. Let it dry completely.
- For best results, replace the brush every 3–6 months.

What’s in the box
- 1 dual-sided shower brush.

Why you’ll like it
- Easier reach means less twisting and less strain.
- Two bristle types give you a gentle clean or a deeper scrub when you want it.
- Steady, safe grip to help prevent slips.

If you have very delicate or broken skin, check with your doctor before dry brushing. Otherwise, enjoy a cleaner, fresher feel with the Metene Shower Brush.
